Key Match Events: Korey Lee threw out Trevor Story attempting to steal second in the third inning.
Dominic Fletcher hit a walk-off RBI single in the ninth inning.
Jacob Amaya and Zach DeLoach followed with back-to-back RBI singles.
Luis Robert Jr. capped the scoring with a sac fly to score Amaya.
Pre-Game Insights: Interim manager Grady Sizemore emphasized the importance of playing clean, competitive baseball.
Post-Match Reflections: Grady Sizemore praised the team's defensive play and clutch at-bats.
Chris Flexen recorded his 10th quality start of the season and his third in his past four starts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Korey Lee entered the game with an average pop time of 1.85 seconds (97th percentile).
Lee's Catcher's Caught Stealing Above Average (four) ranks in the 89th percentile.
